website_summaries.verdict: Scarpa designers made the Mistral GTX a day hiking boot that is both supportive and comfortable. These benefits, plus the effective waterproofing, grip and lightness, were highly appreciated. It was, however, lambasted for its price. All in all, if hikers are willing to shell out more money for a hiker, the Scarpa Mistral GTX is a high-cut hiking boot that can outperform the challenges of the unpredictable outdoor conditions.
pros: According to numerous hikers, the Scarpa Mistral GTX was comfortable right out of the box
They added that it required virtually no breaking in
It was a light pair of hiking boots, based on a lot of user reviews
An expert also commended this attribute
Hordes of wearers were pleased with its excellent ankle support
The good looks of the Mistral GTX from Scarpa received commendation from a majority of hikers
A multitude of owners were grateful with the boot’s reliable grip
Several users applauded its efficient waterproofing
cons: Scores of hikers gave a low score on its slightly expensive price

customer_reviews.title: Best boots and waterproof that I have found.
customer_reviews.text: I have wasted money on many makes if boot as I love hiking and these are the only ones I can wear from the box. They are comfortable with walking socks or for shorter walks ordinary socks are fine. Advise a larger size that the normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J Still

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, very comfy not fully waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, waterproof boot which feels supportive and solid, I’ve walked a fair few times in then now and I’m really pleased with them. Edited today as after a wear in decent rain I’ve found they are not waterproof and This is after following correct advice for cleaning and maintenance on the scarpa website
customer_reviews.author: Bessa

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots get your normal size
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely boots but my feet get very hot in them . Also I ordered a half size up but I should have ordered my usual size as they are a touch on the big size . They are a very wide fitting . Overall I’m very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Page

customer_reviews.title: 2rd time I bought this model
customer_reviews.text: I walk to and from work every day which is about 20,000 steps a day. I had these boots for about 3 years = >10 million steps and they recently started to rub the top of my left foot. So since I loved the first pair so much I made the easy decision to simply replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bates

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Had a lovely supprise when my boots arrived three days early. Just in time before the snow. They are so comfortable it's like wearing slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Boots
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly - really comfortable right out of the box. Can't fault them
customer_reviews.author: Rasputin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy boots
customer_reviews.text: The most comfy boots ive ever had on! Im a size 8 and bought an 8. Fit perfect with medium weight socks on.
customer_reviews.author: graeme

customer_reviews.title: Confortable straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of these shoes I have owned, absolutely love them wear them to walk the dog every day and go hill walking regularly. They are a superb boot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Advertised in half sizes so met requirement. Ordered Thursday, arrived Tuesday. Way before promised.
customer_reviews.author: mags&steve

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair years ago, quality and fit is still excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Bandit

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband.Loves it.Most comfortable walking shoe he has had
customer_reviews.author: Non H.

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof tried and tested.
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof. I went on a very soggy 5 miler on the downs. Fresh out of the box they we’re comfortable. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Great walking boots
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, nice fit , hard wearing , easy to clean . Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: alexander isaac

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Took 20 miles or so to break in but well worth the wait. Very comfortable boots no leaks. V satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and comfortable straight from the box, no breaking in required.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainFoulenough

customer_reviews.title: A very narrow fitting boot
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to wear the boots as they are a very narrow fit
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Benson

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable from start
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable from the outset. Soft leather and really look nice. Did a 15km walk in them on a hot day to break them in with no problems. An extra lace hook might be good to lock heel in even more
customer_reviews.author: Mr J F Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: As many have said, comfortable from the start, no breaking in required. Soft, good quality leather, easy and quick fastening /lacing up, great ankle support and so far perfectly waterproof. Docking one star as I personally find the sole a bit too stiff (personally - my brother, who has the same boots, for example isn't bothered). That's great if you are walking on uneven terrain or soft ground, a bit less if you happen to have to walk on a flat, hard surface, even for as little as 20-30 minutes - it does make my feet ache a little.
customer_reviews.author: Entrigo

customer_reviews.title: Marriage saving boots
customer_reviews.text: My husband has got to be the fussiest man on earth when it comes to boots. He had a pair of these years ago and loved them. When they eventually died after many years use, we couldn’t find any. In the intervening years, he’s gone through umpteen pairs, what a relief when we saw these. Just done two weeks walking again and he’s made me order another pair as he loves them so much
customer_reviews.author: Mumknowsbest

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow, so went a size up.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as my last pair, which lasted 8 years. The fitting was narrow and I had to go a size up. Laces seem a little short too.
customer_reviews.author: iant

customer_reviews.title: Best boots I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Bought to start walking again. I suffer from necrosis of the hip and was advised to get some decent boots by my doctor. Wow, what a difference, no pain either during or after a hike. The boots are supportive and comfortable straight out of the box. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: adrian bennett

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Boot
customer_reviews.text: An excellent boot. I have used it for multiple walks in the Brecons. It travels with me on city breaks, including heavy rains and flooded roads in Rome. Fitted like a glove first time, never had any blisters and I have wide feet. Comes highly recommended. Still watertight after 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: L. POPE

product_meta.title: Scarpa Men's Mistral GTX Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: The mistral gtx is a everyday trekking and travel boot. It combines a super-comfortable waterproof upper with a redesigned midsole construction for improved support and stability, whether you're on the trail or traveling.
